on reading compounds: 驕恣【キョウシ】being proud and self-willed
kun reading compounds: 奢る【おごる】to give (someone) a treat, to be extravagant, to live luxuriously, to be proud, to be haughty
驕る平家は久しからず【おごるへいけはひさしからず】pride goes before a fall, pride comes before a fall, the proud Heike family does not last long
